TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TableLayoutStyleCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public MustInherit Class TableLayoutStyleCollection Implements IList
public ref class TableLayoutStyleCollection abstract : System::Collections::IList
type TableLayoutStyleCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 實作資料表配置樣式集合的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality for a collection of table layout styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表用來描述資料行或資料列中有相關聯的所有樣式集合。The class represents the collection of all the styles used to describe the columns or rows in an associated . 類別衍生自特製化，如下所示：Classes derived from are specialized as follows: - A的集合會彙總資料行樣式物件。A aggregates column styles as a collection of objects. - A做為集合的彙總資料列的樣式物件。A aggregates row styles as a collection of objects. 大部分的成員清單是的實作。Most of the members of are implementations of .

Public Function Add (style As TableLayoutStyle) As Integer

summary.span: 將新的 加入至目前集合的結尾。

span.span: Adds a new to the end of the current collection.
The position into which the new element was inserted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重新套用在目前的所有控制項的資料表配置容器。The method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current container. 儲存在集合中的樣式數目只會受到可用記憶體。The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.

abstract member Clear : unit -> unit override this.Clear : unit -> unit

summary.span: 解除集合與其關聯的 之間的關聯性，然後清空此集合。

span.span: Disassociates the collection from its associated and empties the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法覆寫這個方法。This method cannot be overridden. 方法會執行兩個主要動作：The method performs two main actions: - 其取消目前的關聯從其容器，以便不再樣式套用至面板中所包含之控制項的版面配置。It disassociates the current from its container so that the styles are no longer applied to the layout of the controls contained within the panel. 如此一來，表格版面配置會重新套用在面板中的所有控制項。As a result, the table layout is reapplied to all the controls in the panel. - 它會清空所有的集合及其物件。It empties the collection of all of its objects. 如此一來，屬性設定為 0。As a result, the property is set to 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只是其中一個衍生類型，或是，可以儲存在。Only one of the derived types, or , can be stored in a . 樣式的執行個體可以是只與單一容器相關聯。An instance of a style can be associated only with a single container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法覆寫這個方法。This method cannot be overridden. 再會移除，它會解除關聯從其容器。Before the is removed, it is disassociated from its container. 如此一來，表格版面配置會重新套用在面板中的所有控制項。As a result, the table layout is reapplied to all the controls in the panel.
